ol.li: User makes changes at 3 levels & they need to be addressed at that specific level itself
In our case we need to be address changes at these various levels
Most of the people use reusable actions to define there jobs.
Use of destributed remote caching, to speed up the tasks
pnpm as there package manager client, instead of traditional pm's like npm or yarn
